channel.title: Is there a place to advertise server testing?
channel.description:
Hi everyone i need a tester for my server and i was wondering is there anywhere to advertise for a server tester? if this is the right place contact me if you want to do it! (you have to have hamachi)
Sorry i am not sure please only post if you can be a tester or if this is in the right spot!!
